entry.title: Stop VASP during the program execution

link.title: Stop VASP during the program execution

entry.summary: STOPCAR During the VASP program execution, we can creat a file names STOPCAR to stop the program. If the STOPCAR contains the line: LSTOP = .TRUE. then VASP will stop at the next ionic step. If the STOPCAR contains the line: LABORT = .TRUE.
